topics: The Role of the Law as Revealing Sin
sentimentFlow: The sermon opens heavy, stressing human sinfulness, church drifts into error, and fierce warnings against false teachings that mix works with faith, evoking urgency and condemnation. It builds tension through stories of flawed religion and a personal account of leading an elderly woman to simple faith, exposing the limits of good deeds. It ends light, rejoicing in the freeing gift of grace through Jesus alone, with hopeful prayer and celebration of salvation.
